name: @skcin7/inspire
description: A simple package to print inspirational messages to the console.
author: Nick Morgan

scripts.git-publish: echo "Commit Message?: "; read COMMIT_MSG; git add -A .; git commit -m "${COMMIT_MSG}"; git push;
scripts.git-tag: echo "Tag Version?: "; read VERSION; git tag -a "v${VERSION}" -m "Version ${VERSION}";
